sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>A Cumbersome weapon is large, unwieldy, awkward, or heavy. To wield a Cumbersome weapon properly, the character needs a Brawn characteristic equal to or greater than the weapon's Cumbersome rating. For each point of Brawn the character is deficient, he must increase the difficulty of all checks made while using the weapon by one.</description> <name>Cumbersome (Passive)</name> <number>WQ0001008</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 04:53:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f25b98a02fd46450e0f497eef699b67f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 04:53:44</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
